thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com
thread.title: Juan Ortiz

author: Juan Ortiz
title: Juan Ortiz
text: So I had lost my certificate of citizenship and had been waiting for it so I could get my passport so I could go to much sisters wedding in cancun Mexico. Well when it finally came the wedding was now only a week away. So I went to my post office to see what I could do, they said that I could drive to facilities that does it in two days but the closest one was 7 hours away or I could use a 3rd party company to rush it. So that what I did I went online and searched for expideited passport and came across this company. I got all the documents I needed and sent them off on Tuesday and got my passport on Friday.
